name: Birthday Card
purpose: Generates a virtual birthday card for users, showing personalized content once external data is loaded.
capabilities: Fetch external user data to personalize the card
Render a virtual card preview on the screen
Animate or display interactive elements (e.g., confetti)
Allow users to send or share the card

interactions.description: alerts user when card is ready

entryPoints.description: Main script to initialize the birthday card UI and load user data

notes: The virtual card is displayed only after external data is fully loaded. Animated effects are optional and can be toggled.
constraints: Requires User Data API to be available
Animations can be disabled for performance
